slideOne.slideText: Sign up now to enjoy all portal features

slideTwo.slideText: Take a look at our available APIs

notLoggedIn.heading: Create a developer account first.
notLoggedIn.paragraphOne: Our API Portal enables you to register a free team-based account without on the fly.
notLoggedIn.paragraphTwoPartOne: Once activated, we assist you in 3 straightforward steps to start consuming our API products.
notLoggedIn.paragraphTwoPartTwo: Not sure how to get there? The onboarding documentation will help you along.

loggedIn.heading: We value you as an interested developer!
loggedIn.paragraphOne: enables you to register your client apps and subscribe to our available API products.
loggedIn.paragraphTwoPartOne: Whenever you are ready, we assist you in 3 straightforward steps to start consuming our API products.
loggedIn.paragraphTwoPartTwo: Did you experience any issues with your account set-up?

stepOne.paragraphPartOne: You’ll need an app to send and receive API calls.
stepOne.paragraphPartTwo: Adding your app details will help us to enable this flow.

stepTwo.paragraph: In the "Subscriptions" section, we provide an overview of our available Sandbox APIs your apps can subscribe to.

stepThree.paragraph: Once your app and API subscriptions are all ready to go, head to our "Getting Started" documentation for lift-off.

apiCatalog.paragraph: No APIs have been recently added.

one.title: Experience the Sandbox
one.subtitle: We have released a Live Demo of our Sandbox product. Browse through the features below to see what you can expect.
one.content: The proof of the pudding is, as they say, in the eating.

two.title: Secure Proof of Concepts
two.subtitle: With {{clientName}} Sandbox, secure proof of concepts are as easy to manage as calling an Uber. (We have an app for that.)
two.content: Talk to one of our humans for more information.

three.title: Sail the Seas of Innovation
three.subtitle: {{clientName}} Sandbox is built on open source technology, just ahead of the curve, in order to give you a long and smooth lifetime cycle.
three.content: Docker, Kubernetes, Kong, it is all there.

four.title: Extend and Customize
four.subtitle: The {{clientName}} Sandbox is purpose-built for customization. Do you need a manual onboarding process? Extend. Send your 2FA sms’es through Twillio? Configure. Support Korean i18n? Customize.

features.title: Sandbox Features
features.desc: Focus on your product. No matter where you are, from ideation to POC design, assign all your resources to the creative process!

one.title: Automated onboarding
one.desc: Let your customers set up an account without delays

two.title: Configured by OpenAPI contracts
two.desc: Swagger definitions is all your sandbox needs

three.title: Unlimited API’s and versions
three.desc: Gracefully test or deprecate without worrying about cost

four.title: Live Sandbox with data storage
four.desc: Build persistent interaction with your users, over multiple API's

five.title: Sandbox silo per account
five.desc: Each customer gets a mini-you. No leaks, no performance impact

one.title: Dockerised on any cloud
one.desc: All you need is Docker. Sandbox is "cloud agnostic"

two.title: Managed test users (Oauth2)
two.desc: Depth of test data and PSU emulation, out of the box

three.title: Two-factor authentication (2FA)
three.desc: Allow a leveled security grade throughout your ecosystem

four.title: Multiple users per account
four.desc: Sandbox enables account RBAC for customer self-service

five.title: 100% Open Source
five.desc: MIT license, no lock-in. Sandbox is simply open source.

otherTreats.title: Other Treats
otherTreats.desc: And there are even more cool features under the hood…

one.title: Secure account access (OAuth2)
one.desc: Prove your salt, certainly in your Sandbox environment

two.title: Live API reference docs
two.desc: You focus on proper API contracts, your sandbox generates the output

three.title: Integrated Support
three.desc: Integrate your favourite support service where your user needs it

one.title: Optimised for SaaS
one.desc: Cloudoki is a SaaS provider. It shows in the Sandbox DNA.

two.title: Scalable Portal
two.desc: Read more about the Cloudoki Developer Portal features

three.title: Ready for SSO and SCA
three.desc: Read more about the Cloudoki SSO features

cookiesConsentBanner.paragraphOne: We only use cookies to enable essential website operations, and to ensure certain features work properly, like the option to log in. We do not track. Any personal information you provide to us is removed when you delete your account.
cookiesConsentBanner.paragraphThree: By clicking "I Accept", you agree to essential cookie usage.

warnings.password: Password must have one lowercase, one uppercase, one symbol and be at least 12 characters long.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: The {{config.clientName}} Sandbox can hold an unlimited amount of API Products and API versions. The former defines the business side of an API, the latter is the technical entry, defined by OpenAPI contracts. This view enables you to automate deprecation control and give better insight in how the API’s and applications are linked together.

login.welcomeMsg: Please feel free to login or register, it's completely free!

registerConfirmation.message: A verification link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the instruction to finish your registration!
